data.title: UCLA Learning Centers
data.text:
About Us

The UCLA Learning Centers provide dynamic environments that empower students to express their creativity, embrace innovation, and explore new ideas. We cater to the diverse needs of UCLA students, whether they reside on-campus or off-campus, and whether they are graduate or undergraduate students. Our extensive resources encompass study areas, a MakerSpace, a Gaming Center, a Multi-Media Production Studio for music production, photography, videography, and podcasting, and a wide range of other offerings!

Our dedicated team is composed of both professional and student staff who are eager to assist you in pursuing your passions, engaging in enjoyable activities, or simply finding a conducive space for your studies.

Sunset Village

The Sunset Village Learning Center is located in Delta Terrace Room 150 (across from the main entrance to Covel Commons) and is comprised of three spaces: Lobby/Video Game Lounge; Main Lab 1; Lab 2. The lobby offers couches and counter study space, along with 3 TV monitors for console gaming and two WEPA printers (B&W and Color). Main Lab 1 and 2 serve as study spaces with room for up to 20 people per lab.

Hours:

Mon - Thurs: 10am-12am

Friday: 10am - 5pm

Saturday - CLOSED

Sunday - 5pm- 12am

De Neve Labs

The DeNeve Learning Center is located on the 3rd Floor of the DeNeve Commons building room P333 (next to the Dykstra Hall Bridge) It is compromised of three spaces: Lobby area, Music Production Studio, and computer lab. The lobby offers couches, outlets, and 2 WEPA Printers (one B&W and one Color). The Music Studio offers iMacs, various music production software, midi keyboards, beat pads, and a sound recording booth.

Hours:

Mon - Thurs: 10am - 12am

Friday: 10am - 5pm

Saturday: CLOSED

Sunday: 5pm- 12am

De Neve Studios

The De Neve Studio is located on the 3rd Floor of the De Neve Commons building room (next to the Jacaranda Room and side by side with the media team room) and offers resources like green screen filming, private music studio sessions, and even professional podcasting.

Hours:

Sunday: 6pm-10pm

Monday - Friday: 12pm-10pm

Saturday: CLOSED

Eclipse Gaming & Dev Lounge

The Eclipse Gaming & Dev Lounge is located in Rieber room RH145. Eclipse Gaming & Dev Lounge e will provide never-before-seen access to next-generation gaming resources. Students will have the option to use Xbox Series X, PlayStation 5, high-spec custom PCs and peripheries, and a retro arcade machine with over 4000 games.

Hours:

Monday: 12pm - 9pm

Tuesday - Thursday: 12pm - 12am

Friday: 4pm - 1am

Sunday: 6pm- 12am

Learning Centers Signature Events

Here at the UCLA Learning Centers, we hold a range of events both annually and weekly. If you are looking to be a part of a passionate and easy-going community look no further!! Click the link to check out everything we have to offer!

Events
